attributes.action: Stop the cost of a Lottery ticket doubling to £2
attributes.additional_details: Camelot announced that the price of a Lotto line will double to £2 in the Autumn, this price hike should be stopped and the cost of one line should remain at £1. The National Lottery Commission should halt this rise and the government should debate this in parliment. The great British public shoudn't be exploited in this manner.
